column1: | baby ian andres tejedor passed away friday
column3: 2015 at primary childrens hospital. he was born march 3
column4: 2015 to pedro andres and allison jessica figueredo tejedor. we were so honored to have baby ian with us even through for just a short time. he is survived by his parents
column7: emma nahara tejedor; grandparents washington figueredo
column9: pedro washington tejedor and norma ibete delascio. funeral services will be held wednesday
column11: 2015 at 11 a. m. at the francis peak ward chapel
column14: ut. friends may visit with family from 9 to 10:30 a. m. at the church. arrangements under the direction of lindquists kaysville mortuary
